Title: Tendres cousines
Writer: Pascal Lainé (scenario), Pascal Lainé (based on the novel by), Josiane Lévêque (adaptation), Claude d'Anna (adaptation), Werner P. Zibaso (author)
Actors: Thierry Tevini, Anja Schüte, Valérie Dumas, Évelyne Dandry
Plot: With the outbreak of WWII, the sudden call to arms will send the men of a family's estate to the front, leaving a curious adolescent alone with the remaining women of the house, in need of a warm embrace and, possibly, a daring kiss.
